Html:
Hello, I just wanted to point out that some properties in the DataGrid control, that is, in some classes that are used by it, would be really useful to devs.

That would avoid us to be forced to use either a VisualTreeHelper and rely on the templates used, or Reflection to get the job done.

For instance : DataGridCellsPresenter.DataGridOwner

wouldn't that make sense to expose this property to other developpers in the final release of this control ?

Hi,
I couldn't agree more, and i've just wanted to remind some other things that would be great if they would be exposed:
DataGridColumn.ApplyDataFieldBinding() which is required when you are building your own columns by code.

Regards Jan Dryk
